AudioWorkletNodePort.summary:
The read-only port property of the
interface returns the associated
. It can be used to communicate between the node and its
associated .

blockquote.para:
The port at the other end of the channel is
available under the property of the
processor.

remarks.para:
-Web Audio API
-Using the Web Audio API

AudioWorkletNodePort.value:
The object that is connecting the
AudioWorkletNode and its associated AudioWorkletProcessor.
